content: i d been teasing my boyfriend for a while that i d knit him a pair of underpants pink eyelash yarn had been mentioned so when it came to knitting him birthday socks i wanted something quite the opposite simple and eminently wearable plain stockinette wasn t quite special enough though even with nice yarn they can of course be knitted for girlfriends or assorted friends and relations or yourself i recently discovered these socks apply the same stitch pattern that is used in handknit holidays log cabin socks this is quite a different sock pattern though e g toe-up it s for standard sockweight yarn and can be knitted to a variety of sizes i thought it was funny melanie falick and i both thought the intertwined cables had romantic uses if i was feeling very soppy i d say the cables were having a cuddle
